title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 160.7 - Variations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 160.7 - Variations

State Regulations

If there shall be unnecessary and unusual hardship in the
carrying out of the provisions of this regulation, the commissioner may, after
appropriate investigation, make a variation from such provision, if the intent
of this regulation and article 13 of the Labor Law is observed. Any person
affected by this regulation may petition the commissioner for such variation, stating in writing the grounds therefor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
160.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
